result.arabic_text: ۞ وَإِذۡ نَتَقۡنَا ٱلۡجَبَلَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٞ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُۥ وَاقِعُۢ بِهِمۡ خُذُواْ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكُم بِقُوَّةٖ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ
result.translation: Yeroo Nuti gaara xuur gubbaa isaanii irratti akka gaaddisaa ta’ee ol fuunee, isaan isaanirratti kufa jechuu dhugoomsanii "Waan nuti isiniif kennine ciminaan qabadhaa, Akka (Rabbiin) sodaattaniif jecha waan isa keessa jiru qhubadhaa" (jenne yaadadhu)
